title: How to read novels more efficiently - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are trying to read novels efficiently, you are not doing it right. Novels are meant to be lived and felt. They are not supposed to be read efficiently. While reading a novel, you need to put yourself in the shoes of the characters and experience life through their eyes. You need to believe that you are in that particular place, and you are actually living life the way the characters are living. The mark of a good novel is that it helps the reader in this process of transferring himself or herself to the realm of the novel, through vivid imagery and powerful descriptions. Do not read novels just for the sake of reading them. That really defeats the purpose. Whenever you read a novel, just dive into the plot and take your time. There is no need to hurry. There is definitely no need to be efficient.

There are many ways you can increase the efficiency of reading and these are very simple to perform. Start using techinques like speed reading and start trying to predict and for see the next sentence without looking at it.Always always try to visualise the story when you are reading the book, it helps a lot even with school books.You can try using methods like mind palace, to better remember the story in very high detail.These 3 tips can increase your reading efficiency by more than 50% , you can also use this as a methods to stuff more information in that tiny nut brain of yours. That's it have a nice day and suggestions are welcomed

Novels are not meant to be read efficiently, they are to be experienced. Reading a novel efficiently is like loving someone efficiently, or staring at the mountains efficiently, or savoring that drink in the summer efficiently, or hearing music efficiently. You will lose the whole point and meaning of doing the activity. You must feel while you’re reading a novel, because you’re on a journey through someone else’s mind. Experience it, don’t be efficient about it.

One cannot read a novel efficiently. It's not a machine whose output will determine its efficiency. Novels are meant to be picturised and the reader is supposed to become a spectator of the ongoing scene. Imagining a particular plot of the story on your own is the best way to enjoy the content of the novel. One becomes a part of the story when they start enjoying it. One starts to feel the emotions revolving around the story when they get totally involved in it, when they start feeling it. Novels share a person's experience, a reader is supposed to become a part of that experience. Cheers to reading!! Gracias :)

Novels could take you into an imaginary world which you have never seen before. one efficient way of reading any novel is to imagine whatever you read from the novel as like watching a movie. While picturing what you are reading, makes you more focused and interested in the subject. After started using this way of reading books, helped me to finish novels in a short period of time. I guss this would be help to you All the best

If you don't enjoy what you're doing then doing that is just a total waste of time. Enjoy the novel you're reading and take notes if you like any quotes or unknown vocabulary of that novel. Happy reading <3
